mapper.select: select su.* from sys_role sr inner join sys_user_role sur on sr.id = sur.role_id inner join sys_user su on sur.user_id = su.id where sr.id = #{roleId}
select * from sys_user t where t.username = #{username} and is_deleted = 0

select * from sys_user s left join sys_org o on o.id = s.org_id where s.is_deleted=#{p.isDeleted}
and o.id=#{p.orgId} or o.parent_id=#{p.orgId}

select id, full_name, username, org_id, id_card, job_number, nick_name, user_type, head_portrait_url, phone, telephone, email, birthday, sex, qr_code, last_login_time, user_status, org_id, creator, gmt_create, editor, gmt_modified, remarks from sys_user where is_deleted = 0 and id = #{id}
